title: MINUS THE BEAR Appears To Be Teasing A Reunion
description: Dave Knudson isn't up to much now. The post MINUS THE BEAR Appears To Be Teasing A Reunion appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 5 hours ago
excerpt: Dave Knudson isn't up to much now.
text: Latest News MINUS THE BEAR Appears To Be Teasing A Reunion Dave Knudson isn't up to much now. Minus The Bear wrapped up their career with one final show on December 16, 2018 at The Showbox in Seattle, WA. Guitarist Dave Knudson went on to do a bunch of Botch farewell tours and the rest of Minus The Bear went on to do whatever they were doing. Now Minus The Bear is teasing "news soon" and has launched a website with a countdown that ends sometime around noon Eastern Standard time on March 10. So y'know, stay tuned. But I'm guessing it's new music or a tour, given the hype they're trying to build. It’s also worth noting that 2025 is the 20th anniversary of Minus The Bear's 2005 record Menos el Oso. So maybe it’s an anniversary tour around that? Want More Metal? html:
Latest News

MINUS THE BEAR Appears To Be Teasing A Reunion

Dave Knudson isn't up to much now.

Minus The Bear wrapped up their career with one final show on December 16, 2018 at The Showbox in Seattle, WA. Guitarist Dave Knudson went on to do a bunch of Botch farewell tours and the rest of Minus The Bear went on to do whatever they were doing.

Now Minus The Bear is teasing "news soon" and has launched a website with a countdown that ends sometime around noon Eastern Standard time on March 10. So y'know, stay tuned. But I'm guessing it's new music or a tour, given the hype they're trying to build. It’s also worth noting that 2025 is the 20th anniversary of Minus The Bear's 2005 record Menos el Oso. So maybe it’s an anniversary tour around that?
